name: Vestige (itch) (AIE Seattle, Rhea, peterthe_geek, tari, TheIronFist, Httpor, JimJimGames)
name_original: Vestige (itch) (AIE Seattle, Rhea, peterthe_geek, tari, TheIronFist, Httpor, JimJimGames)
description:
Overview

Project Dominion is a supernatural thriller where you, the player go on a psychological journey through the mind of a private investigator.

Feedback Survey:

https://forms.gle/RC1AU2TCmP3kTnLNA

Controls

WASD - Move

E - Pick up

Right click - Aim

Left click - Throw/Shoot

R - Reload

C - Toggle Crouch

Esc - Pause

2 - Pistol

3 - Rock
